:::Gigatron:::

Gigatron: Does this mean goodbye Child?  Will i ever see you again?
::he wasnt sure, since everyone else here was either family or 
practically family, except him::







--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Shomin95@a... wrote:
> :::Herald looked at gigatron with a gave of wonderment:::
> 
> Herald: "Its...Its...Its beyond me!"
> 
> :::Child was pulsing with power, he floated of the growned, his 
head thrown 
> back and chest out. He glowed with power . He stoped at the top fo 
the hill, 
> and right below him, a tre began to grow, its branches twined them 
selves 
> around him until only his arms and head were left. He spoke:::
> 
> Child: "I Will not be here much longer. soon I will be bound in the 
tree of 
> Life and none will see me until the end of all things. The himans 
have 
> evolved, they will begin to creat cizalations so now we have a new 
goal. We 
> must still fight agenst this war, but  we must also protect the 
humans! They 
> are the matrixes last hope for peace. Father, you must ake command 
of the 
> group. Now, you may each ask a question."
> 
> :::Only Tran steped fowered:::
> 
> Tran: "Why you? Why will we never see you again?"
> 
> Child: "Why me? Because I am no longer a transformer, Im not even 
mortal! I 
> am an angel and can no longer be with the living. as to never 
seeing me 
> again, you will never see this body again, but you will see me 
again. For i 
> shall come back, as Christ, Peter, John Paul the First. But for 
most I will 
> return as Saint Patrick, the uniter of Ierland. And, when the world 
ends, 
> this very tree will split open, and I will fly threw the Univers, 
singing the 
> song of the Final end of all things. any other questions..."
